full_text: You can find the free pattern here - https://cozynooksdesigns.com/EasyStreetTee/ * You can find the Lion Brand Yarn kit here - lionbrand.sjv.io/LKEkGV The Easy Street Tee is a breathable summer knit perfect for staying cool in warmer weather. Its top-down raglan construction lets you try it on as you go for a custom fit, and the twisted rib edging adds a crisp, polished finish. With a just-right neckline—not too wide, low, or tight—this tee is easy to dress up or down and wear through multiple seasons. 9 sizes are included in the design. Considered Easy level.
